categories: Category:Articles that are known by a nickname

nodes.text: "Sprint" was the nickname of a clone snowtrooper serving in the Grand Army of the Republic during the Clone Wars.

Cold assault trooper "Sprint" served in the Skirmish on Carlac along with a Jedi General, Clone Commander CC-3636, and other members of the 104th Battalion. He and a squad of troopers were stationed outside the wreckage of a crashed Munificent-class star frigate, attempting to find a way inside.
